cu.explanation_en: Setting Asn1 verbosity to an unknown value 'invalid' will cause the ASN.1 parser to fail initialization and prevent the CU from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting max MIMO layers to 8 exceeds the supported maximum of 4, causing configuration validation failure and DU startup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為 8 超過支援的最大值 4，會導致配置驗證失敗和 DU 啟動失敗。
